New Records: Shohei Ohtani hit his 44th home run of the season
Mookie Betts hit his 14th home run of the season
Freddie Freeman hit his 44th home run of the season
First time in Dodgers' history the team went deep in their first three at-bats of a game
Key Match Events: Arizona Diamondbacks scored four times in the bottom of the first
Dodgers tied the score on a Gurriel Jr. homer in the third
Max Muncy's RBI single gave the Dodgers a lead in the fifth
Tommy Edman's single in the ninth drove in two go-ahead runs
Evan Phillips retired the side in order in the ninth
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Dave Roberts emphasized the importance of the team's fight and determination
Shortstop Miguel Rojas highlighted the team's ability to win close games
Pitcher Evan Phillips reflected on the team's current situation in the standings and the importance of maintaining intensity
Miscellaneous Highlights: Corbin Carroll's inside-the-park home run benefited from poor Dodgers defense
